dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2866 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 2866) entitled An Act to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the centennial of Boys Town, and for other purposes., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: On page 7, strike lines 8 through 10, and insert the following: “shall be paid to the United States Treasury for the purposes of reducing the national debt.”.
